title.narrative: APOYO PROGRAMA REPARACIÓN COLECTIVA EN COLOMBIA

description.narrative: Apoyo al Programa de Reparación Colectiva en Colombia para generación de confianza, la construcción de paz territorial y el fortalecimiento del Estado de Derecho

participating-org.narrative: MPTFO-UN Multi-Partner Trust Fund for Sustaining Peace in Colombia (previously known as MPTF-Colombia Post-Conflict UNMPTF)

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

title.narrative: Integrated Results and Resources Framework (IRRF)

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to

title.narrative: Output Indicator 3.2.2.1.C

description.narrative: Country has national and local systems restored or adopted following crises: (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Community-oriented security services and oversight mechanisms

title.narrative: Output Indicator 3.2.2.1.B

description.narrative: Country has national and local systems restored or adopted following crises: (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Victim redress mechanisms including transitional justice

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.1.2.3.C.2

description.narrative: Country has an improved enabling environment for expansion of decent work and livelihoods: Direct support of livelihood in: Private sector (If YES, please provide Number of livelihoods supported)

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.1.2.3.A.1

description.narrative: Country has an improved enabling environment for expansion of decent work and livelihoods: Policy, legal, regulatory and institutional frameworks

title.narrative: Output Indicator 3.2.2.1.D

description.narrative: Country has national and local systems restored or adopted following crises: (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Across a) – c) utilizing joint UN approaches to rebuilding rule of law and justice sector institutions and services

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.1.2.1.A.1

description.narrative: Number of people accessing basic services, disaggregated by target groups People eligible for basic services
